h2_title: Mad Tiger Mini-Boss Fight and Guide
content: Just be wary, as he’ll often follow up the two arm slash by leaping straight up into the air before crashing down in a slamming attack.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mad_Tiger.md', within the main section titled 'Mad Tiger', specifically from the subsection 'Mad Tiger Mini-Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Just be wary, as he’ll often follow up the two arm slash by leaping straight up into the air before crashing down in a slamming attack.
